headline.main: DRIVES BY ITALIANS FAIL, GREEKS STATE; Counter-Offensive Along the Entire Front Halted, Athens Spokesman Reports MORE FASCISTI CAPTURED Machine Guns and Automatic Rifles Seized -- Rome Claims the Taking of Prisoners

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Feb. 2 -- Italian attempts at a large-scale counter-offensive have failed all along the line, according to official statements tonight.
abstract: Greeks capture mt range, prisoners, loot, Klisura area

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: ATHENS, Feb. 2 -- Italian attempts at a large-scale counter-offensive have failed all along the line, according to official statements tonight....

byline.original: By A.C. SEDGWICKBy Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
